verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There’s a call comes ringing o’er the restless wave, “Send the light! Send the light!” There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save, Send the light! Send the light!

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: We have heard the Macedonian call today, “Send the light! Send the light!” And a golden off’ring at the cross we lay, Send the light! Send the light!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let us pray that grace may ev'rywhere abound; Send the light! Send the light! And a Christ-like spirit ev'rywhere be found, Send the light! Send the light!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Let us not grow weary in the work of love, Send the light! Send the light! Let us gather jewels for a crown above, Send the light! Send the light!
